title: Stargate Atlantis S03E03 - Irresistible.avi
description:
Sheppard, Teyla, McKay and Ronon arrive at a village led by a jovial baker named Lucius Luvin, who shows off his six wives while urging the team to trade their ship for a few local herbs. Unimpressed with his preposterous offer, the team soon departs. In case Lucius&#039;s herbs are actually of medicinal value, however, Dr. Beckett visits the village to investigate.

After a long delay, Beckett returns to Atlantis ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ with Lucius. Because the Ancient city&#039;s safety depends on its secret existence, Weir is appalled at the doctor&#039;s thoughtless breach of security, but Beckett insists that Lucius is worth it. Despite her concern that Beckett is acting less like his usual rational self and more like a fawning schoolboy, Weir agrees to meet with the baker. But later, when Sheppard and McKay return from another mission, they find Weir, Teyla, Ronon and the rest of Atlantis&#039;s personnel obeying Lucius&#039;s every command with besotted obedience. Although they can&#039;t guess how or why he&#039;s doing it, Sheppard and McKay realize that, clearly, Lucius is controlling people&#039;s minds.

McKay spots the baker drinking a mysterious potion and steals a small sample for analysis. He needs more of the substance to complete his research, however, so Sheppard returns to the village. There, he finds Lucius&#039;s doting wives and friends pining for his return, even growing physically ill ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ as if they&#039;re in withdrawal from drug addiction. They eagerly give him a sample of Lucius&#039;s "daily medicine" after Sheppard promises to bring their beloved baker home.

Back at Atlantis, Sheppard finds that McKay, too, has become one of Lucius&#039;s mindless minions. Worse, Lucius has sent Beckett, Teyla and Ronon on an irresponsible mission to a Wraith-dominated planet. By sheer luck, they return unharmed after a fierce battle, jubilant to give their beloved Lucius a rare herb he asked them to collect there.

Reluctantly, Sheppard plays along with his friends&#039; insanity until he can steal McKay&#039;s half-finished research, abduct Beckett, and fly him to the mainland. There, as Beckett struggles through withdrawal, Sheppard pieces together Lucius&#039;s secret. The potion ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ made with the herbs from the Wraith planet ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ allows Lucius to secrete a pheromone that stimulates the prefrontal cortex in the brains of people nearby, resulting in euphoric emotions and extreme suggestibility. Sheppard hasn&#039;t inhaled much of the chemical so far, but that&#039;s about to change: Teyla, Ronon and McKay are hunting for him. When they capture him, it won&#039;t be long before he, too, succumbs to Lucius&#039;s overwhelming charm.
